name: esl
description: Client and Server for FreeSwitch Event System

scripts.syntax:test: tsc --allowJs --outDir dist --rootDir . --lib esnext --target esnext --noEmit --strict --checkJs --moduleResolution nodenext -m nodenext -noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --strict --strictFunctionTypes --strictNullChecks --noImplicitAny false test/*.mjs
scripts.build:test: coffee --bare -c test/*.litcoffee && (cd test && for f in *.js; do mv $f $(basename $f .js).mjs; done)
scripts.pretest: yarn install && yarn prepublishOnly && yarn build:test
scripts.presyntax: mkdir -p build && coffee -c -b -l -M -o build src/*.litcoffee && (cd build && sed -i -e 's/[.]litcoffee/.mjs/' *.js && for f in *.js; do mv $f $(basename $f .js).mjs; done)
scripts.syntax: tsc esl.d.ts && tsc --allowJs --outDir dist --lib esnext --target esnext --noEmit --strict --checkJs --moduleResolution nodenext -m nodenext -noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --strict --strictFunctionTypes --strictNullChecks --noImplicitAny false build/*.mjs

usage: Test with podman  build --ulimit nofile=1048576:1048576 -f test/Dockerfile .
